channel.title: How do i make a npc say somthing?
channel.description: hi atm im playing on my new source 0.0.0.0 but it has npc saying stuff that i dont like how do i change what they say?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2007, 05:51:39 PM[/size][hr]my friend did it by saying ::rant then npc number then typing what he wanted it to say but someone else told me npchandler but i dont know java html anything...

item.title: How do i make a npc say somthing?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

npchandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Shit owns you noobs."; } }

Read full topic
